title: Password Reset Flow Chart
description: Outlines the process a user goes through to reset their password, including email verification.
steps: User clicks on forgot password link
User enters email address on the forgot password page
Password reset request is sent to the backend
Backend sends a password reset email to the user
User clicks on the reset link in the email
User is redirected to a password reset page
New password is saved in the database
User is notified of successful password reset
